description: A BitBake append file (.inc) that contains the recipe configuration and metadata for building GLib 2.0 in a Yocto Project environment, including dependencies, package definitions, build steps, and other build-related configurations.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Prepend step that modifies the gdbus-codegen.in file with the correct interpreter line.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Install step that adjusts files, removes temporary files, and manages multilib gio-querymodules.

methods.name: do_install:append
methods.description: Additional install adjustments for native targets, such as removing test files.

methods.name: do_install:append:class-target
methods.description: Conditional install adjustments based on target features and environment.

methods.name: do_install:append:mingw32
methods.description: Removes specific script files when cross-compiling for Windows.
